meanings: Verb think of, be interested in, want
(사고, 사색) thought, thinking, (계획) idea, think, consider
(기억) (formal) remembrance, remember, look back on, bring[call] (sb/sth) to mind
(마음, 의지) (마음) mind, (의향) inclination, (의도) intention, think (of/about), intend, plan, mean, contemplate (doing)

vlive.korean: 어떻게 생각해요? What do you think? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺야식시간
각자 생각해 놓은 건 있어? Have you thought about it? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 21. 각성해서 나타난 성균관대 꾼!! 서울대 츄플의 위기??!!
우리 생각해보니까 진짜로... I thought about what we did. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [SKZ VLOG] 리노 : 리노, 하고 싶은 거 다 하지 마
vlive.english: I thought about what we did.

vlive.korean: 진우는 생각해 봤어? 가사에 좀... What about you Jinu? Lyrics... 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 21. 각성해서 나타난 성균관대 꾼!! 서울대 츄플의 위기??!!
버섯 먹을 때 무슨 생각해요? What do you think when you eat mushrooms? 듣기 View video OSEN : Golden Child 골든차일드, 치킨 100마리도 먹을 것 같은 식성 #스타로드 09
vlive.english: What do you think when you eat mushrooms?

examples.korean: The time has come to think the unthinkable. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 상상도 할 수 없는 일을 생각해[고려해] 보아야 할 시간이 다가왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The time has come to think the unthinkable. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: What do you think this is? Scotch mist? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신은 이게 뭐라고 생각해요? 스코틀랜드 안개비?(당신은 분명히 뭔가를 알고 있지 않느냐는 뜻으로 하는 말) Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What do you think this is? Scotch mist? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I know what I’ll be doing for the next three weeks but I haven't thought beyond that. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 다음 3주 동안은 무엇을 할 것인지 알겠는데 그 이후는 생각해 보지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I know what I’ll be doing for the next three weeks but I haven't thought beyond that. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Just think of the expense! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그저 그 비용을 한번 생각해 봐! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Just think of the expense! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’d like to think it over. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 제가 (그것에 대해) 생각해 보겠습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’d like to think it over. Add to Wordbook
